name: QueuePolicy
description: The AWS::SQS::QueuePolicy type applies a policy to SQS queues.

properties.name: PolicyDocument
properties.description: A policy document containing permissions to add to the specified SQS queues.

properties.name: Queues
properties.description: The URLs of the queues to which you want to add the policy. You can use the Ref function to specify an AWS::SQS::Queue resource.
